answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!In your case what you have is a buffalo hump which can be due to localized fat deposition or due to over weight. You must look at various causes of obesity—rich diet, lack of exercise, adrenal gland problems, hypothyroid state, diabetes etc.Taking care of these problems can control this hump to a great extent.Hope this helps. Take care!

Oh my goodness thank you so incredibly much for replying! And thank you for the hope you've given me as well when you said, "Taking care of these problems can control this hump to a great extent." THANK YOU!
